text: We are experiencing increasing difficulties conducting experiments on this floor.
Transporting subjects from the lower floors for infection trials is becoming too risky if we wish to keep this operation secret.
For this reason, we are considering relocating our parasite experiments to a different site.
Specifically, to the metro tunnels beneath the bunker.
They are much closer to our test subjects and serve no useful purpose otherwise.
We estimate the relocation will take a few weeks, but it will be worth it in the long run, preventing unrest among those who still care for the lower floors.
